pull.title: Move script flag to/from-string logic from tests to script/interpreter
pull.body:
When we last discussed making scripts debuggable (sometime after #3901), the plan was to instead trace execution rather than single-step through it.

This is a dependency step toward that, and is eventually used for the RPC `verifyscript` to parse its `"flags"` option.

See also #10729

events.body: I'm okay with moving this out of the tests if it's necessary in another place, however the from/to string stuff doesn't belong with the interpreter consensus code IMO. Better to keep it in a separate compilation unit, like with the CBitcoinAddress split done in #11117.
Hmm, so where would you suggest? Bundle it in with RPC-specific stuff?

events.message: script: Move SCRIPT_VERIFY_* enum to its own header file (script/script_flags.h)
Move script flag to/from-string logic from tests to script/script_flags

Rename "P2SH" script flag (string only) to "BIP16"

P2SH is a general term, and can be applied to Segwit program v0 of 32 bytes too

events.body: Rebased, and moved it to script/script_flags.{h,cpp} for now.
Closing due to apparent lack of interest/reviewers
